loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and pay for labor to plant coffee seedlings and maintain the adult coffee plants.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es: Don Carlos es un joven emprendedor, el tiene una pequeña tienda de venta de electrodomésticos. El es el único sustento para su familia y las ventas han sido muy bajas debido a que no cuenta con el inventario suficiente, es por esto que él necesita de un préstamo de seiscientos mil colones (600.000) para la compra de mas electrodomésticos y poder tener mayor cantidad de productos en su tienda. Con este préstamo el va a poder mejorar sus ingresos y así la calidad de vida de su familia, además de seguir con sus estudios y superarse como persona.
texts.en: Carlos is he an enterprising young man and has a small store selling home appliances. He is the sole support for his family and sales have been very low due to the fact he doesn't have enough inventory. This is why he needs a loan of 600,000 colones to buy more appliances and to be able to have a greater quantity of products in the store. With this loan he is going to be able to improve his income, in addition to continuing with his education and excelling as a person.

loans.use: To sell home appliances.

loans.name: Marleny De Jesus

texts.es:
Marleny es una madre muy responsable de 3 hijos, ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y continuar progresando con su familia. 

Hace un tiempo montó su venta de huevos, para lo cual tiene una cantidad de gallinas que le permiten tener ciertas ventas. 

Sueña con ver su negocio crecer y sabe que con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar y de las personas que apoyen su oficio podrá lograrlo.

Es por esto que busca un préstamo que le permita comprar más gallinas para poder incrementar su capacidad de producción de huevos y así responder a la demanda de sus clientes por los huevos.

De esta manera sus ventas se incrementarán considerablemente, además de que su negocio resurgirá y podrá salir adelante. 

Marleny también desea tener un gran negocio donde pueda utilizar toda la capacidad que pueda para sacarlo adelante y así ofrecerles a sus hijos un futuro económico estable.
texts.en:
Marleny is a responsible mother of three children. She has had many challenges in her life. However, she has always had strength to push forward and continue progressing with her family.

Some time ago, she started selling eggs since she has a number of chickens which allows her to have sales. 

She  wants to see her business grow and she knows that with the help of the Corporación Interactuar and the people who support her she can achieve her goal. 

She is requesting a loan that will allow her to purchase more chickens in order to increase the capacity of egg production and respond to the demands of her customers. 

Her sales will increase considerably. In addition, her business will make a come-back and she can make progress. 

Marleny also wants to have a big business where she can utilize her full capacity to move ahead and offer her children a stable economic future.

loans.use: purchase more chickens.

loans.name: Ami

texts.fr: Âgée de 30ans, Ami Dédé a pour mari un chauffeur. Ils ont en charge un enfant de 03ans. Pour prêter main forte à son conjoint dans les charges familiales, elle a décidé en 2000 de revendre des pagnes, des chaussures aux populations de KPALIME. Elle se fait aider par 01 personne et s'approvisionne généralement à Lomé. Elle fait un premier crédit à WAGES pour acheter plus de marchandises. Comme perspectives d'avenir, elle souhaite ouvrir une seconde boutique et envoyer son enfant à l'étranger pour les études.
texts.en: Ami Dédé is 30 years old and is married to a driver. She and her husband are taking care of a three-year old child. In order to help her husband with family expenses, in 2000 Ami Dédé decided to sell traditional colorful "pagnes" fabric and shoes to local customers in Kpalimé. She is assisted by one additional worker and usually stocks up in Lomé. This is her first loan from WAGES intended to stock up on merchandise. As to long-range plans, she would like to open a second sales point and send her child abroad to study.

loans.use: to buy traditional fabric and shoes.

loans.name: Amanbek

texts.ru: Аманбек, 34 года, женат, отец двоих детей дошкольного возраста. Супруга активно помогает по хозяйству. У Аманбека среднее образование. В качестве основного источника дохода для семьи, он занимается животноводством. Начатое со стартовой суммы в 30,000 сом (KGS) в 1999 году, сегодня хозяйство приносит около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. На данный момент в хозяйстве Аманбека имеется 7 коров, 13 лошадей, 35 овец, 10 коз. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, он обратился в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 300 тюков сена для скота. Доходы от кредита он планирует направлять на дальнейшее развитие бизнеса.
texts.en: Amanbek is 34 years old, married, and has two children of preschool age. His wife actively helps him in his business. Amanbek has received secondary education. As a main source of income for his family, he raises livestock. His farm, which he launched in 1999 with the starting capital of 30,000 KGS, now brings in about 10,000 KGS Per month. At present Amanbek's farm has seven cows, 13 horses, 35 sheep, and 10 goats. In order to develop his business further, he has applied to the Bai Tushum microfinance association for a loan in the amount of 100,000 KGS to buy 300 bales of hay to use as feed for his livestock. He plans to use his revenues for an additional expansion of his business.

loans.use: to purchase 300 bales of hay as feed for his livestock.

loans.name: Mauricio Andres

texts.es:
Mauricio cuenta con una experiencia de 15 años en la actividad de la confección, tiene su taller de confección a terceros en su casa desde hace 10 años. 
Trabaja durante todo el día y con su taller desea generar empleo para personas con muchas necesidades. 
Esta actividad la aprendió de su hermano quien le enseñó desde muy pequeño. La ventaja es que ya tiene reconocimiento en el sector y la calidad de sus productos es muy buena, lo que le ha permitido cada vez conseguir más clientes para su negocio y también se ha transformado en buenos pedidos. 

Prefiere trabajar durante 10 horas aproximadamente todos los días.
Debido a que en la actualidad su capacidad de producción no alcanza para satisfacer a todos sus clientes, Mauricio requiere de un préstamo para comprar Compra de insumos para confección como tela, hilos, agujas, encajes, botones, entre otros, para abastecer su taller.

Su mayor anhelo es salir adelante con su taller de confección y poder tener en su hogar unas mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Mauricio comes with 15 years of experience in tailoring. He has run his sewing workshop in his house for 10 years.

He works all day, and would like to create jobs for people with great need through his shop.

He learned to tailor from his brother, who taught him from a young age. His advantage is that he is recognized in his neighborhood and the quality of his products is very good, such that it has allowed him to get more customers for his business and has transformed into good orders.

He prefers to work about 10 hours a day.

Since his production capacity cannot catch up to satisfy all his clients' orders, Mauricio desires a loan to buy sewing supplies such as fabric, thread, needles, lace, buttons, and others, to supply his shop.

His greatest yearning is to succeed with his tailoring shop and be able to have the best economic opportunities in his household to progress together with his family.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies such as fabric, thread, needles, lace, buttons, and others, to stock his shop.

loans.name: Melania

texts.es: Doña Melania es una Señora emprendedora, ella compra y vende artículos de acero como relojes y cadenas, ella tiene un pequeño negocio del cual logra el sustento para su familia. Ella necesita de un préstamo seiscientos mil colones (600.000) para comprar mas artículos de acero y así aumentar su negocio. Con este negocio ella le da el sustento a su familia día a día, ya que es el único ingreso con el que cuentan, y espera mejorar los ingresos para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Melania is an enterprising woman who buys and sells metal accessories such as watches and chains.  She has a small business with which she manages to support her family.  She needs a loan of 600,000 Costa Rican colones to buy more metal items to expand her business.  With this business, she provides for her family's daily sustenance, because this is the only income that they rely upon.  She hopes to improve her income so that she can give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy metal accessories

loans.name: Mirgul

texts.ru: Миргуль 44 года, замужем, мать 3 детей школьников. Она работает санитаром в больнице. Супруг и дети активно помогают по хозяйству. У Миргуль среднее образование. В качестве дополнительного источника доходов для семьи, она занимается животноводством, начав бизнес в 2010 году с 35,000 сом (KGS). Хозяйство на сегодня приносит в среднем 12,000 сом (KGS) в месяц в основном от продажи экологически чистого, вкусного молока. На данный момент в хозяйстве Миргуль имеется 1 дойная корова, 1 нетель и 5 бычков.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита Миргуль планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en:
Mirgul is 44 and married with three school-aged children. She has a high school education and works as a hospital cleaner; she also works in animal husbandry as an additional source of income for her family, a business she started in 2010 with 35,000 KGS. Her husband and children actively help her with the farm, which currently brings in an average of 12,000 KGS monthly, primarily from sales of delicious organic milk. She currently has one dairy cow, one heifer and five steers.

With the goal of further developing her business, Mirgul has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 KGS to purchase livestock. She plans to put profits from the loan toward further increasing her quantity of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase livestock for fattening and resale

loans.name: Saul Dario

texts.es:
El señor Saul es un hombre muy emprendedor y creativo, desde hace mucho tiempo ha querido ser independiente y tener su propio negocio de carnicería.

Actualmente puede materializar su sueño gracias su gran capacidad de trabajo, al apoyo que recibe de la Corporación Interactuar y de las personas que deseen que él salga adelante con su negocio.

De este negocio dependerán su esposa y sus hijos a los cuales desea enseñarles del negocio y dejarles un legado.

Solicita un apoyo económico para comprar herramientas de corte de carne, bascula, mesa de corte, cava, y elementos de limpieza.

Con un préstamo podrás a poyar a un veterano lleno de vida y empuje para su familia!
texts.en:
Saul is a very creative and entrepreneurial man who for a long time has wanted to be independent and have his own butcher shop. 

He can realize this dream now thanks to his hard work and the support he receives from the Interactuar corporation and from the people who hope that he succeeds in his business.

His wife and children, to whom he wants to teach the business and leave a legacy, will depend on this business. 

He requests economic support to buy tools for cutting meat, a scale, a cutting table, an icebox, and cleaning elements.

With this loan you can support a veteran full of life and drive!

loans.use: to buy tools for cutting meat, scales, cutting table, icebox and cleaning elements

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a freezer, refrigerator, supplies and ingredients for preparing food

loans.name: Ramon Emilio

texts.es:
El señor Ramon desde muy joven se dedica a las funciones del campo tales como agricultura y cría de animales, actividades que le enseño su padre para que saliera adelante en su vida.
Hoy en día su actividad principal es la agricultura y la ganadería, tiene como objetivo mejorar su capital comprando algunos lotes de ganado que le permitan abastecerse y generar mejores ingresos, y esta es la razón por la cual solicita un préstamo.
Es padre responsable y amoroso con sus hijos, vive en una finca con ellos y su esposa quien ha sido su más grande compañía.
Sueña con poder otorgarles a sus hijos una educación de calidad para que más adelante se puedan defender solos y sean independientes.
Todos los días asiste su negocio y procura por hacer las cosas muy bien y sabe que con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar podrá llegar muy lejos.
texts.en:
Señor Ramon has been a fieldworker in both agriculture and animal raising since a very young age, activities that his father taught him so he would succeed in his life.

Today his principal activities are agriculture and raising livestock. His goal is to improve his capital by buying some batches of cattle that allow him to stock up and generate better income, and this is the reason he asks a loan.

He is a responsible father and loving with his children. He lives on an estate with them and his wife, who has been his greatest companion.

He dreams of bestowing upon his children a quality education through which they can succeed, become independent, and provide for themselves.

He works his business every day and seeks to do everything well, and knows that with the help of the lending partner Corporación Interactuar he will be able to go very far.

loans.use: to buy a cattle batch.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Maria, de 28 años, tiene muy claro que es lo que quiere para su vida y está decidida a culminar sus estudios para salir adelante y tener una buena vida.

Ella desea desempeñarse como vendedora de mercancía tales como ropa y fajas de reducción.

Esta actividad desea iniciarla con el afán de buscar los recursos necesarios para su sostenimiento y para sus estudios, además de poder contribuir con los gastos en su hogar.
Es una mujer emprendedora y muy disciplinada.

Ella solicita un crédito para comprar un amplio surtido de fajas y ropa al por mayor y de este modo aprovechar la oportunidad que le presenta la Corporación Interactuar de ser independiente.

Tiene la esperanza de poder progresar como empresaria y tener unos ingresos más estables y agradece a todas las personas que puedan contribuir con su sueño.
texts.en:
María, 28, knows exactly what she wants in life and is determined to finish her studies to get ahead and have a good life.

She wants to work selling merchandise such as clothing and girdles.  She wants to start this job to have the resources she needs to support herself and her studies.  She also wants to be able to help with her household expenses.  She's an enterprising and very disciplined woman.

María's requesting a loan to buy a wide supply of girdles and clothing wholesale.  That way she'll make the most of the opportunity from Interactuar Corporation to be independent.

She hopes to be able to make progress as an entrepreneur and have a more stable income.  She's grateful to all the people who are able to contribute to her dream.

loans.use: to buy a wide supply of girdles and clothing wholesale

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal DULCE NOMBRE DE JESUS, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Francisca tiene 31 años de edad tiene 03 hijos y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de elaboración de colchones, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio,, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de materiales.
texts.en:
The member, Francisca, belongs to the communal bank DULCE NOMBRE DE JESUS [Sweet Name of Jesus] which is located in Cusco district, in the department of Cusco. She is 31 years old, married, and has three children. She combines her daily activities with her work sewing mattresses. She has been doing this for quite some time and it has been going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into it each day. Francisca is a responsible, hard-working woman and this is why she has been able to move her family ahead.

Francisca is asking for the loan to buy materials. She feels grateful for the loan she is receiving and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy materials.

loans.name: Kandalatkhan

texts.ru: Кандалатхан, 61 год, замужем, есть 4 детей. У Кандалатхан среднее образование, 30 лет она занимается сельским хозяйством. У нее в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы. На участке мерою 0,30 Га она выращивает картофель для реализации. Ежемесячный доход Кандалатхан составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от ведения бизнеса Кандалатхан планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса, так же она хочет отремонтировать сарай.
texts.en: Kandalatkhan is 61 years old, married and has four children. Kandalatkhan has a secondary education. For the past 30 years, she has been practicing farming. She has two cows on her farm. On her 0.30 hectare plot of land, she grows potatoes for sale. Kandalatkhan's average monthly income is 20,000 som (KGS). She turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan. She is requesting 50,000 som (KGS) to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Kandalatkhan plans to invest the earnings from the business in the further development of the business. She also wants to renovate her barn.

loans.use: to buy additional cows to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Nurgul

texts.ru: Нургул, 37 лет, есть 3 детей школьного возраста, образование - неоконченное высшее. Нургул уже давно занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду, в хозяйстве Нургул есть 3 коровы, 8 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет в среднем 15,000 сом (KGS). Нургул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS), целью которого является покупка шифера и досок для накрытия крыши ее нового дома. Доходы от сельского хозяйства она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, Нургул хочет закончить строительство дома для ее семьи.
texts.en: Nurgul is 37 years old and has three school-aged children. She has an uncompleted higher education. Nurgul has been practicing livestock breeding for a long time. Thanks to her hard work, she has 3 cows and 8 sheep on her farm. Her average monthly income is 15,000 som (KGS). Nurgul turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan. She is requesting 50,000 som (KGS) to buy roofing slate and boards to cover the roof of her new house. She plans to invest the earnings from her farm in the further development of her business. Nurgul also wants to finish the construction on her house for her family.

loans.use: to buy roofing slate and boards to cover the roof of her new house.

loans.name: Magali

texts.es:
La socia Magali pertenece al banco comunal DULCE NOMBRE DE JESUS,  la socia sigue con su negocio de venta  de pollos, la socia se siente contenta por el préstamo pues se compromete a pagar sus cuotas puntualmente y agradece por la ayuda brindada, la socia la socia continua vendiendo su mercadería a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia es una persona responsable, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de pollos.
texts.en: Our member Magali is from the communal bank of Dulce Nombre de Jesus. She continues to sell chickens and is content with the loan. She promises to pay dues on time and gives thanks for the help provided. This member continues selling her products to clients who ask for it. She is a responsible person, and in this way, she is able to keep her family moving forward. She asks for a loan to buy chickens.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Leyvis Sofia

texts.es:
Leyvis a sus 22 años de edad, debido a la falta de oportunidades de empleo y por necesidad económica se motiva a independizarse y conseguir ingresos por su cuenta, por eso desea iniciar un negocio de panaderia que estará ubicado en una esquina muy transitada del barrio donde reside en municipio de Tierra Alta.
Ella desea ofrecer en su negocio distintos productos como pasteles. Panes, roscones, entre otros, con esto espera conseguir los recursos necesarios para satisfacer sus necesidades básicas. 
Leyvis es una mujer trabajadora, pujante, emprendedora, solicita el crédito como apoyo para invertirlo en la compra de activos fijos como hornos y mesas de trabajo e insumos para elaborar los alimentos como harina, queso, levaduras, entre otros para tener disponibilidad y variedad de productos que satisfagan los gustos de todos sus clientes, de esta forma podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar.

Gracias al apoyo de la Corporación Interactuar y a los prestamistas de Kiva podrá montar este negocio y conseguirá ser independiente.
texts.en:
Leyvis, at 22 years of age, due to the lack of opportunities for employment and economic need, is motivated to become independent and earn and an income on her own. For this reason, she wants to start her own bakery business which will be located in a very busy corner of the neighborhood where she lives in Tierra Alta. 

She would like to over different products such as cakes, breads and roscones, among other things in her business. With this she hopes to earn the resources necessary to support her basic needs.

Leyvis is a hardworking woman, forceful, entrepreneurial. She is requesting a loan to invest in buying fixed assets such as ovens, work tables and supplies to make food such as flour, cheese and yeasts, among other things, to have a variety of products available to satisfy the preferences of her clients, thus being able to have a better quality of life and well-being. 

Thanks to the support from the Interactuar corporation and Kiva lenders, she will be able to build this business and become independent.

loans.use: to buy fixed assets like ovens, work tables and supplies to make foods such as flour, cheese and yeasts, among others.

loans.name: Mery Ingrid

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal DULCE NOMBRE DE JESUS, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia continua  al negocio de brosteria, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia continua vendiendo a sus  clientes que le solictan, siendo de esta forma que la socia  saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de pollos, aceite, entre otros.
texts.en:
Mery belongs to the “Dulce Nombre de Jesus” (“Sweet Name of Jesus) communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which is in the department of Cusco.

She continues her rotisserie business. She is thankful for the loan offered and promises to comply with the established repayment schedule. She is a responsible and diligent person. She continues selling to the clients who request her services. In this way, she takes her family forward. 

She requests a loan to buy chickens and oil, among other things.

loans.use: to buy chickens and oil, among other things.

loans.name: Isabel De Jesus

texts.es: Este es el tercer crédito que Isabel obtiene a través de financiamiento de KIVA-MiCredito. La  agricultura es su principal fuente de ingreso tanto para el como para su familia. El crédito anterior le fue de mucha ayuda ya que pudo comprar una vaquilla la cual ya tendrá a su cría. La vaquilla le ha sido provechosa ya que podrá obtener la leche para convertirla en cuajada y tenerlo como alimentación en su hogar. En esta ocasión solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar semillas de frijol y los insumos necesarios para la siembra.
texts.en: This is the third loan that Isabel is getting from KICA-MiCredito financing. Agriculture is his principal source or income both for him and his family. The previous loan was very helpful because he was able to buy a cow which is already about to have a calf. The cow has been profitable for him because he can get milk from it which he makes into curd and have as food in his home. This time he is requesting a new loan to buy bean seeds and the supplies necessary to plant them.

loans.use: to buy bean seeds and the supplies necessary to plant them.

loans.name: Samara

texts.ru: Самара, 31 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей, младшему нет еще и года, старшей дочери 11 лет. У Самары - среднее образование, с 2002 года в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, она занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду, в хозяйстве Самары на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы, 10 овец. Также есть 1,0 ГА арендованной и 0,45 ГА собственной земли, где Самара и ее семья выращивают ячмень для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях увеличения своего бизнеса Самара обратилась в Банк «Бай–Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита она будет вкладывать в увеличение бизнеса и постройку сарая для скота.
texts.en: Samara is 31 years old, married and together with her husband, is raising four children. Their youngest child is not yet a year old; Their oldest daughter is 11 years old. Samara has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, she has been practicing livestock breeding and crop farming since 2002. Thanks to Samara's hard work, she currently has 2 cows and 10 sheep on her farm. She also has 1.0 hectares of rented land and 0.45 hectares of her own land on which she and her family grow barley for personal consumption and sale. Her average monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). For the further expansion of her business, Samara turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan for 150,000 som (KGS) too buy livestock to increase the size of her herd. She plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further expansion of her business and in the building of a barn for her livestock.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Liliana Maria

texts.es:
Liliana es una mujer con toda la energía y disposición para enfrentar el mundo y superarse.

Desea iniciar un negocio de venta de alimentos en un local, con este negocio podría obtener ingresos para poder mantener y sostener a su hijos de 17 años.

Es una mujer muy aplicada y tiene deseos de salir adelante y ser exitosa.

Solicita un crédito para la compra de materiales para la construcción de su local y compra de activos como hornos, utensilios de cocina, insumos, entre otros.

Con este préstamo puede cumplir su sueño de ser independiente y darle a su hijo todo lo que necesite, además de poder progresar gracias al apoyo de Kiva y la Corporación Interactuar.

Apoya el proyecto de una madre emprendedora Colombiana!
texts.en:
Liliana is a woman with all the energy and disposition needed to face the world and succeed. 

She wants to start a business selling food. With this business she will be able to earn income so that she can support her child, who is 17 years old.

She is a very focused woman and she has dreams to get ahead and be successful.
 
She is requesting a loan to buy materials for the construction of her business and to buy assets such as ovens, kitchen utensils and supplies, among other things.

With this loan she can achieve her dream of being independent and give her son everything he needs, as well as be able to progress thanks to the support of Kiva and the Interactuar Corporation. 

Support of the project of this entrepreneurial Colombian mother!

loans.use: to buy materials to build her business and buy assets like ovens, kitchen utensils and supplies, among others.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Doña Victoria es madre soltera de 5 hijos quienes le apoyan y trabajan en el campo junto a ella. Tiene 43 años de edad, un grado de estudio de primaria completa el cual a pesar de las dificultades económicas que sus padres presentaban le pudieron apoyar. Su medio y única fuente de ingreso económico es la agricultura siembra cultivo de café y malanga lo cual tiene 10 años aproximadamente de hacer iniciando con sus padres y tomando la decisión de hacerlo de forma independiente una vez conociendo el rubro en su totalidad pues es muy bueno y beneficioso. La tierra que trabaja es propia la cual está ubicada a 20 minutos de su casa de habitacion a la cual se traslada en compañía de sus hijos caminando ya que ellos son su único apoyo para realizar algunas tareas que requieren de fuerza y tiempo. Como productora de café y malanga sus metas están enfocadas en el crecimiento con su negocio, la ampliación del mismo y el mejoramiento continuo esperando sus hijos se interesen en el rubro y que ellos continúen haciendo crecer el mismo. Doña Victoria Solicita apoyo económico para la compra de abono, fertilizantes, foliares entre otros que serán de mucha ayuda y beneficio para sus plantaciones de café para salir adelante y hacer que su negocio crezca por lo cual espera ser apoyada.
texts.en:
Doña Victoria is a single mother of 5 children. Her children help her and work on the farm with her. She is 43 years old. She completed primary school despite the economic difficulties her parents had. Her only source of income is her cultivation of coffee and malanga, a job that she began 10 years ago with her parents. (Malanga is a root vegetable similar to taro or sweet potato.) Once she became familiar with the business, she made the decision to work independently. She is good at what she does, and benefits from it.

She farms her own land, located 20 minutes from her house. She and her children reach the farm on foot. Her only help is her two children, and they assist with jobs that require strength and time.

As a coffee and malanga producer, her goals are focused on the continued growth and betterment of her business. She is hoping that her children will be interested in the work, and that they will continue to grow the business. Doña Victoria asks for economic support to buy compost, fertilizers, and leaf treatments, among other things. They will be of much help and benefit to her coffee plantings. They will move the business forward and make it grow; therefore, she hopes for the help.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizer, and leaf treatments to help with her coffee and malanga cultivation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to keep improving his home.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal DULCE NOMBRE DE JESUS, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio continua  dedicándose a brindar el servicio de taxi, el socio se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, él socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, él socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para realizar el mantenimiento.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank DULCE NOMBRE DE JESUS [Sweet Name of Jesus] which is located in the district and department of Cuzco. He continues to offer his taxi service and is a responsible, hard-working person. He has been engaged in this business for some time and it has been going well for him. This is what has allowed him to move his family forward.

The member is asking for the loan so he can maintain his taxi. He is grateful for the loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to do maintenance.

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal BUENOS AMIGOS, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Carmen Rosa continua  con su negocio de venta de artesanía, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con todas sus cuotas, la socia continua vendiendo su mercadería a  sus clientes que le solicitan como chompas, polos entre otros, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de chompas de alpaca  entre otros.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the BUENOS AMIGOS [Good Friends] community bank. The bank is located in Cusco. 

Member Carmen Rosa continues her business selling handicrafts. She is thankful for the loan she was given and she promises to make all her payments. The member continues to sell her merchandise to her clients, who request sweaters and polo shirts, among other things. She is thankful for the loan and she promises to make her established payments. 

The member requests a loan to buy alpaca sweaters and other items.

loans.use: to buy alpaca sweaters, among other things.

loans.name: Qorilazo Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “QORILAZO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Elena ella es casada y tiene 41 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de comida, la socia realiza diferentes platos como pollo al horno, sopas y saltados de carne, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y pollo.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de frutas, negocio de comida, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These people belong to the communal banking group "Qorilazo".  This bank is located in the district of Cusco and belongs to Cusco province and the Department of Cusco.  

The group member Elena is married and 41 years of age.  She has 4 children.  She works selling food and makes a variety of different dishes including baked chicken, soups, and marinated meats.  She works from 8am to 6pm and she has eight years of experience in this business.  Things are going very well.  Her dream is to have a restaurant.  She is asking for a loan in order to purchase products for cooking such as rice, vegetables and chicken.  

The other group members work selling fruit, making meals, running a grocery store, and running a restaurant. 

Elena is thankful to those who form part of this dream via the Kiva lending medium.  She promises to comply with the repayment of her loan.

loans.use: to purchase products for cooking such as rice, vegetables and chicken.

loans.name: Milton Jose

texts.es: El aire fresco que respira Milton es inigualable, él es de oficio agricultor, se dedica a sembrar trigo así como a cortar semilla de zacate para venderlo. Milton también tiene sus vaquitas las cuales las ha ido adquiriendo con las ganancias que ha tenido gracias a la siembra del trigo. Milton solicita un crédito para comprar el alimento para sus vacas y comprar un ternero que le están ofreciendo, de esta manera podrá tener un ganado bien alimentado y así obtener buenas ganancias con la venta de este. Su principal meta es obtener otro crédito para comprar cinco terneros para repasto.
texts.en:
The fresh air that Milton breathes is incomparable. He is a farmer. He is dedicated to growing wheat so that he can cut the germ of the fodder to sell it. Milton also has cows, which he has been buying with his earnings from the wheat. 

Milton requests a loan to buy food for his cows and to buy calf. In this way, he will be able to have better-fed cattle and, thus, earn a better income from selling them. 

His main goal is to obtain another loan so that he can buy five cows to fatten and resell.

loans.use: to buy food for his cows and to buy a calf.

loans.name: Jose Moises

texts.es:
Moisés, de 50 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, no tuvo la oportunidad de poder estudiar una carrera universitaria, porque los costos eran muy altos y sus padres no tenían solvencia económica; está casado, es padre de dos niños, su esposa se dedica a oficios domésticos, sus dos hijos están estudiando, uno está estudiando segundo grado y el otro está en parvularia.

Moisés, se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería desde hace 14 años, trabajo que aprendió de sus padres.- Su lugar de trabajo, está ubicado a una distancia de 30 minutos y llega hasta ahí caminando; su día comienza a las 5:30 a.m a esa hora él se levanta a ordeñar algunas vacas, luego regresa a las 12:00 del mediodía a casa, para ayudarle a su esposa en oficios dómesticos.

Moisés, está solicitando un crédito a CREDICAMPO para comprar dos vacas lecheras, de esta manera tendrá un ingreso más a su familia, debido a la producción de leche que generen las vacas.

Moisés, sueña en un futuro, poder mejorar su vivienda para darles más comodidades a sus hijos y poder darles un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
Moises is 50 years old, and he studied through high school. He did not have the opportunity to study in university because the cost was very high, and his parents did not have enough money. He is married and is the father of two children. His wife is dedicated to household tasks, and his two children are studying. One of his children is in second grade, and the other is in nursery school.

Moises has worked in agriculture and livestock for 14 years; this is work he learned from his parents. His place of work is located 30 minutes away, and he walks there. His day begins at 5:30am; at this time, he wakes up to milk some cows. Then he returns at 12:00 in the afternoon to his home to help his wife with the housework. 

Moises is requesting a loan from CREDICAMPO to buy two dairy cows. In this way, he will have more income for his family, since he will be able to produce more milk from the extra cows. 

Moises dreams for the future are to be able to improve his house to offer more comfort to his children and to be able to give them a better future.

loans.use: to buy two cows.

loans.name: Maria De La Paz

texts.es:
María, ha fundado hace más de 3 años una venta de hamburguesas, hot dogs, tortas mejicanas, bebidas entre otro tipo de comida rápida, atiende al publico 4 días a la semana, de dos de la tarde a siete de la noche, su ventaja es que no existe competencia en la zona para su negocio. María, vive en casa propia con dos hijos de 16 y 12 años de edad, es madre soltera, su hijo mayor le ayuda realizar algunas actividades en el negocio.
Comprará una mesa, sillas, así como también repollo, tomates, aguacates, aderezos, bebidas, etc., ofrecerá comodidad a sus clientes y tendrá materia prima para elaborar la venta de comida rápida, su objetivo es tener un negocio con un inventario bien surtido e incrementar sus ventas y ganancias. Sus riesgos son la delincuencia que existe en la zona.
María anhela ampliar su negocio, tener recursos económicos con los que pueda apoyar a sus hijos a culminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
More than 3 years ago, Maria began selling hamburgers, hot dogs, torta mexicana [a type of sandwich], drinks and other types of fast food. She serves the public 4 days a week from 2 in the afternoon to 7 at night. Her advantage is that there is no competition for he business in the area. Maria lives in her own home with 2 children ages 16 and 12 years old. She is a single mother, and her oldest child helps her with some of the tasks in the business.

She will buy a table and chairs, as well as cabbage, tomatoes, avocados, seasonings, drinks, etc. This will offer comfort to her customers, and she will have good ingredients to use in making and selling fast food. Her goal is to have a business with a well-stocked inventory to increase her sales and earnings. Her risks are the crime that exists in the area.

Maria wants to expand her business, and have financial resources to help her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy a table and chairs, as well as cabbage, tomatoes, avocados, seasonings, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José, de 26 años de edad, tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar hasta sexto grado, está casado y su esposa se dedica a oficios del hogar y no tiene hijos. 

José, se dedica a la agricultura, este oficio lo aprendió de sus padres desde que tenia la edad de 15 años, para llegar hasta su trabajo Luis, viaja 25 minutos en bicicleta y su horario de trabajo comienza a las 6:00 a.m y regresa a casa a las 12:00 p.m a ayudar a su esposa en los oficios de la casa.

José, invertirá el crédito para comprar dos vacas de repasto, para cuidarlas y luego venderlas.

José, sueña con tener su negocio propio y poder ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
José, 26 years old, had the opportunity to study up to sixth grade. He is married and his wife takes care of their home. He does not have children.

José works in agriculture. He learn this job from his parents since he was 15 years old. To get to work, he travels 25 minutes by bicycle. His work day starts at 6:00 a.m. and he returns how at 12:00 p.m. to help his wife around the house.

José will invest this loan in buying two cows for grazing so that he can care for them and later sell them

José dreams of having his own business so that he can help his family.

loans.use: to buy two cows for grazing.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca tiene 40 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive en casa propia con sus 3 hijos en el distrito de La Matanza, ubicado en la provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte del Perú. La vida en el distrito se desarrolla tranquilamente, sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y crianza de animales como actividades económicas principales.

Ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza, chicha de jora y harina de jora, cuenta con más de 3 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El destino del crédito será para realizar mejoras en su vivienda, comprará calamina para su techo así como madera, pintura, entre otros materiales para realizar reparaciones en su casa. Con esto Francisca espera tener unas mejores condiciones para vivir lo que le va a permitir llevar una vida más comoda y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Francisca, 40, is a single mother who owns the home where she lives with her three children in the district of La Matanza, located in the province of Morropon in the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru. Life in the district is peaceful; its inhabitants mainly work in agriculture, cattle and small animal husbandry.

Francisca sells beer, corn beer, and corn flour. She has been in this business for over three years and has very good personal and professional references in the area. This loan will help her to make improvements to her home. She will buy corrugated roofing as well as wood, paint and other materials to make repairs. With this, Francisca hopes to have better living conditions that will allow her family to be more comfortable and ultimately improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to make improvements to her home. She will buy corrugated roofing, wood, paint and other materials to make repairs.

loans.name: Bolormaa

texts.en: Bolormaa, 39 years old, lives with her husband and daughter in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has been selling clothes since 2011. Her husband renders a taxi service. Their daughter goes to secondary school. She is requesting a loan of 3000 USD to buy a heavy truck in order to start a new business. Over the past years, demand for heavy trucks increased greatly due to the mining boom. So she wants to rent out a heavy truck to people who have expertise but no money to own a truck.

loans.use: to buy a heavy truck in order to start a new business.

loans.name: Señor De Muruhuay De Huayaringa Group

texts.es: El grupo “SEÑOR DE MURUHUAY DE HUAYARINGA” es un grupo conformado por mujeres trabajadoras y responsables. Máxima tiene 40 años de edad es soltera con un hijo dependiente. Ella implemento su bodega en su vivienda hace 02 años. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más abarrotes aceite detergentes bebidas. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Máxima viste polo de color fucsia.
texts.en:
The lending group "Senor de Muruhuay de Huayaringa" is made up of hardworking and responsible women.

Maxima, 40, is single and has one dependent child. She has run a grocery store out of her home for the last two years. She will invest this loan in the purchase of more groceries, oil, detergent and beverages.

The group is grateful to the Kiva lenders for the loans provided. Maxima is in a fuchsia t-shirt.

loans.use: to buy more groceries, oil, detergent and beverages.

loans.name: Aurea

texts.es:
La socia Aurea pertenece al banco comunal HUAYNA CCAPAC   ,la socia sigue dedicándose al negocio de venta de autopartes para carros, la socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia continua vendiendo  su mercadería  a sus clientes que le solictan,la socia continua vendiendo llantas, parabrisas entre otros, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
 La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de repuestos  como parabrisas entre otros.
texts.en: The member, Aurea, belongs to the communal bank HUAYNA CCAPAC. She continues to make a living selling auto parts. The member feels very thankful for the loan and promises to make all of her regular payments. The member still sells her merchandise to her clients. She sells tires and windshields, among other things. In this way she provides for her family. The member requests a loan to by replacement parts such as windshields.

loans.use: to buy parts, such as windshields, among other things.

loans.name: Angela Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal HUAYNA CCAPAC,la socia Ángela María sigue  dedicándose al negocio de venta de regalos como peluches, perfumes y juguetes, la socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar adornos, cuadros, peluches entre otros.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank HUAYNA CCAPAC. The member, Ángela María, still makes a living selling gifts such as stuffed animals, perfumes, and toys. She is happy for the loan and promises to make her planned payments. The member is a responsible and hardworking persona, which is how she helps her family get ahead. 

The member is requesting a loan to buy decorations, pictures, and stuffed animals, among other things.

loans.use: to buy decorations, pictures and stuffed animals, among other things.

loans.name: Hilda Casimira

texts.es:
La socia Casimira pertenece al banco comunal HUAYNA CCAPAC, el banco está ubicado en el departamento de Cusco.
La socia continúa  con su negocio de venta de autor partes de autos como parabrisas, faros entre otros, la socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando parta de eta manera continua apoyando a su familia.
Las personas mayores de 65 años de edad están excluidas del sistema financiero formal y gracias a los inversionistas de Kiva pueden lograr su financiamiento de tal manera la socia se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar parabrisas entre otros.
texts.en:
Member Casimira belongs to the community bank HUAYNA CCPAC. The bank is located in the department of Cusco.

The member continues her business selling auto parts such as windshields and headlights, among other things. She is happy for the loan and she promises to make her payments. The member is a responsible and determined persona. She wants to be able to keep working so that she can continue to support her family.

People over 65 years old age are excluded from the formal financing system and thanks to Kiva lenders are able to achieve funding. The member promises to make her payments within the established period of time. 

The member is requesting the loan to buy windshields, among other items.

loans.use: to buy windshields and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy all the metal, paint, electrodes, etc that he needs to meet the orders that he has right now.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio, con el crédito anterior recolecto su cosecha en el tiempo justo para abastecer a su familia y a sus clientes, su negocio en la agricultura actualmente se ampliado un poco más, con las ganancias ha comprado algunas reses para producir derivados de la leche y comercializarlas en el futuro.
Está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para comprar abono, insecticidas, fertilizantes y semilla de maíz, continuara trabajando en el campo y generando los recursos económicos que tanto necesita para seguir subsistiendo con su familia.
texts.en: Julio, with is previous loan, collected his harvest just in time to supply food for his family and his customers. His farming business has grown and, with his earnings, he has bought some cows in order to produce dairy products to sell in the future. Julio is requesting this loan in order to buy compost, pesticides, fertilizers, and corn seeds. He will continue working in the fields and generating financial resources that are necessary to continue supporting his family.

loans.use: to buy compost, pesticides, fertilizers, and corn seeds. He will continue working in the fields and generating financial resources.

loans.name: Bayanmunkh

texts.en:
Mr. Bayanmunkh, who is 42 years old, lives with his wife and daughter in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been providing taxi services to local people since 2012. His wife sells clothes at a trade center. Their daughter goes to secondary school.

Mr. Bayanmunkh is requesting a loan of 3,000 U.S. dollars (USD) to buy a light truck in order to transport goods. Fierce competition from other taxi drivers and the profit from transporting goods has convinced him to buy a light truck and go into transporting goods between districts. The borrower is confident about his new business.

loans.use: to buy a light truck in order to transport goods

loans.name: Luz Esperanza

texts.es: Luz es una mujer de 32 años de edad, acompañada y madre de 3 hijos quienes estudian en la escuela de la comunidad. Ella tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar en la primaria de forma completa y que por razones económicas ella no puedo completar sus estudios. Decidió dedicarse a realizar la actividad que la familia desempeña la siembra y cultivo de café como fuente de ingreso económico para poder salir adelante ya que en la comunidad no hay muchas oportunidades de trabajo por lo que la mayoría de las familias se dedica a la agricultura. Junto a su conyugue trabajan duro para salir adelante pues tuvieron la bendición y la dicha manifiesta ella de que sus padres le heredaran un terreno el cual trabajan desde hace 5 años ubicado a 2 kilómetros al cual se trasladan caminando ya que cuentan con un medio de transporte. Su sueño y meta es que su cultivo y plantación de café sea una de la más productivas para poder sacar el mejor provecho posible sobre los mismos y generar mayores ingresos para dar a su familia un mejor estilo de vida y apoyar a sus hijos en sus estudios para que ellos salgan adelante. Por lo que actualmente Luz solicita apoyo económico para la compra de fertilizantes, abono, foliares y el pago de mano de obra para dar a su plantación de café el mantenimiento necesario y que este rinda mejores frutos en esta nueva temporada.
texts.en:
Luz is a 32-year-old woman who is married. She has three children, who study in a local school in the community. Luz had the opportunity to finish elementary school, then for financial reasons, she was not able to finish her studies. Luz decided to make a living through the activity that her family carries out: sowing and harvesting coffee. This source of income allows her to get ahead in a community where there are not many opportunities to work. That is why most families make their living through farming. Together with her husband, Luz has worked hard to move forward and she was blessed that her parents left her some land to inherit. 

She has worked on this land for the last five years. It is located two kilometers from her house; she walks there each day. Luz's dream and goal is that her harvest and coffee plantation would become more productive so that she would be able to take full advantage of them and generate more income. Then she could give her family a better lifestyle and support her children in their studies so that they get ahead. 

Liz is requesting this loan in order to buy fertilizer, compost, and other items as well as pay workers to play her coffee and maintain the plants as necessary. This will help to produce better fruits in the upcoming season.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and to pay laborers to help her with her coffee crops.

loans.name: Ana Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth, de 36 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, debido a problemas económicos de sus padres, no pudo seguir estudiando; es madre soltera de tres hijos, dos de ellos tienen su propio hogar y solo uno vive con ella.

Elizabeth, se dedica a la agricultura y la ganadería, trabajo que realiza desde que tenia 18 años de edad, lo aprendió de sus padres, su lugar en donde ella siembra, está ubicado a 1 kilómetro de su casa y para llegar a ese lugar tiene que caminar, su día de trabajo empieza a las 5:00 a.m a esa hora tiene que trasladar el ganado para que coma, luego regresar a casa, a hacer oficios del hogar.

Elizabeth, está solicitando el crédito a CREDICAMPO para comprar una vaca para ordeño, de esta manera mejorará la produción de leche y tendrá mas ingresos económicos para su hogar.

Elizabeth, sueña con tener una ganadería grande y poder darle un mejor futuro a su hijos.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, 36 years old, studied up until sixth grade. Due to her parents' economic problems she couldn't continue to study. She is a single mother of three children. Two of them have their own homes and one lives with her.

Elizabeth earns her living by agriculture and livestock, a job which she has done since she was 18 years old. She learned it from her parents. The place where she plants is located 1 kilometer from her house. To get there she has to walk. Her work day starts at 5:00 a.m. At that hour she has to move the herd so that it can eat, then come home and do the household chores.

Elizabeth is requested a CREDICAMPO loan to buy a milk cow. That way she can improve the milk production and she'll have more income for her home. 

Elizabeth dreams of having a large herd and being able to give her children a better future.

loans.use: to buy a cow for milking.

loans.name: Lerry

texts.en:
Lerry is 52 years old and married with six children. With two children who are still in school, Lerry works very hard to provide for her family.

Lerry runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as soft drinks, canned goods, spices, sugar, etc.

Lerry has been in this business for 5 years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as softdrinks, canned goods, spices, sugar, etc

loans.name: Chantha's Group

texts.en: The two members of Chantha’s Group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Chantha makes a living cultivating rice and also does extra work as a traditional clothes maker to support her family. In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help both women safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Mawar Group

texts.en:
For the past six months of keeping a sow and piglets, Ni Komang has not had any difficulties or problems. She sold her piglets, and she earned 200,000 Indonesian rupiahs (IDR) profit per month.

This profit is higher than her profit from the previous period because the price for pork increased this month. Because of the good result, Ni Komang's husband has given his full support for her business. Her effort has proven to meet her children's school needs.

Providing for their needs in life today is very expensive; it forces everyone to work hard to make ends meet. Ni Komang cannot just rely on the income of her husband as a farmer; she also has to work. Raising pigs is one solution.

Ni Komang got a loan to purchase superior feed and renovate the cage for her pigs. She's preparing for the newborns. Her husband and her children have helped her to raise the pigs. They feed and clean the cage every day. With good cage and food hygiene, Ni Komang hopes the pigs will be healthy and thrive.

One member of the group could not be present because of illness; she’s in the hospital now.

loans.use: to purchase superior feed and renovate the cage for her pigs.

loans.name: Bridaine

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal HUAYNA CCAPAC  ,la socia continua  dedicándose al negocio de venta de repuestos de carros, la socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia continua vendiendo  su mercadería  a sus clientes que le solictan,la socia continua vendiendo llantas, parabrisas entre otros, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
 La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de repuestos  como parabrisas entre otros.
texts.en: The member belongs to the communal bank HUAYNA CCAPAC. The member continues to earn a living selling car parts. She feels very thankful for the loan and promises to make her payments. The member continues to sell her merchandise to her clients who request it. The member still sells tires and windshields, among other things, this being the way that she supports her family. The member requests a loan to buy replacement parts such as windshields.

loans.use: to buy replacements parts such as windshields.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos es un hombre de 36 años de edad, vive en una comunidad de Sololá, junto a su hermosa familia. 
Santos es un hombre que le encanta trabajar con la agricultura, él cultiva diversidad de verduras, pues él está muy agradecido por el primer prestamo que obtuvo, ya que con ese prestamo,  mejoro el mantenimiento de su cultivo y logro buenas cosechas y los  vendió a buen precio. 
Pues Santos ahora está solicitando un segundo prestamo, que le servirá para invertir en el cultivo de zanahoria y también para la compra de insumos tales como semillas y fertilizantes, Santos manifiesta que los prestamos le han ayudado para mejorar su cultivo, porque tiene todos los insumos a su alcance y los aplica a la fecha indicada. El sueño de Santos más adelante es obtener mejores ingresos y ganancias.
texts.en:
Santos is a man of 36. He lives in a community of Sololá with his beautiful family.

Santos is a man who loves to work in agriculture. He raises a variety of vegetables. He is very grateful for the first loan that he obtained, since with this loan, he improved the maintenance of his crops and achieved good harvests and sold them at a good price.

Now Santos is applying for a second loan, which will serve him to invest in his carrot crop and also to purchase supplies such as seeds and fertilizers. Santos states that the loans have helped him to improve his crops, because he has all the supplies available and he applies them at the indicated time. Santos' dream for the future is to obtain better income and earnings.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers to raise carrots

loans.name: Mirian Josefa

texts.es: Doña Mirian se encuentra muy feliz por el apoyo económico que fue brindado por la cooperativa COMIXMUL en alianza con los diferentes inversionistas en la plataforma de KIVA, ya que gracias a su primer financiamiento solicitado ella pudo cumplir su meta de fortalecer la planta, la tierra y sobre todo de obtener un grano de maíz sano y provechoso. Da gracias a Dios por haber permitido que las puertas y el financiamiento brindado fuera posible pues era necesario para poder obtener los resultados esperados en la temporada. Doña Mirian hoy en día solicita un segundo crédito con el fin de nuevamente abonar la cosecha de maíz, abono de tierra para la nueva cosecha en los próximos meses de manera que la misma sea cada vez más provechosa en cada temporada y mejorar los resultados en cada cosecha. Ella espera que se le sea nuevamente apoyada para poder salir adelante y en algún momento formar un capital propio y trabar con menos financiamiento pues el mismo siempre es necesario para crecer e invertir en el negocio.
texts.en:
Mirian's happy about the financial support from the COMIXMUL cooperative in association with the various Kiva lenders.  Thanks to her first loan she was able to achieve her goal of strengthening the plants and the land, and, in particular, of getting a healthy and profitable grain of corn.  She gives thanks to God for having opened the doors to the loan, because it was necessary to get the expected results for the season.

Mirian's requesting a second loan now to again fertilize the corn harvest and the land for the new harvest in the coming months.  That way the harvest will be more profitable all the time in each season, and the results of each harvest will improve.

She hopes she'll be helped again so she can get ahead and at some point get together some of her own capital and make do with less financing because it's always necessary to grow and invest in her business.

loans.use: to buy inputs and to pay for labor to help with the corn harvest

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es:
El socio  pertenece al banco comunla HUAYNA CCAPAC,el socio continua  dedicándose al negocio de restaurant y a la venta de cerveza, el socio se siente agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, él socio continua trabajando conjuntamente con su esposa siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de carnes, menestras, aceite entre otros.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank HUAYNA CCAPAC. The bank continues to earn a living in the restaurant business and the sale of beer. The member is very thankful for the loan and promises to make his payments. The member continues to work with his wife, this being the way that he supports his family. 

The member requests a loan to buy meats, dried beans and oil, among other things.

loans.use: to buy meats, dried beans, oil, etc.

loans.name: Martin De Jesus

texts.es:
Martín, de 29 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, no pudo seguir estudiando por falta de recursos económicos, está acompañado, no tiene hijos y su compañera de vida se dedica a los oficios del hogar.

Martín, se dedica al la agricultura y la ganadería desde que tenia 19 años, este oficio lo aprendió de sus padres, su trabajo esta ubicado a una distancia de 2 kilómetros de su casa, para llegar hasta ahí tiene que caminar; su horario de trabajo comienza a las 5:00 a.m y regresa a casa a las 12:00 m.d a seguir colaborando con oficios de la casa, nadie mas trabaja en el hogar solo él.

Martín, está solicitando el crédito, para comprar dos terneros, el planea cuidarlos un año y luego venderlos para poder cancelar el crédito y con la ganancia obtenida poder invertirla en mejorar su vivienda.

Martín, sueña con un futuro mejor para su compañera de vida y sus futuros hijos.
texts.en:
Martín, 29 years old, studied through high school. He couldn't continue studying for lack of economic resources. He is in a relationship, doesn't have children and his partner takes care of the home. 

Martín earns a living in agriculture and livestock since he was 19 years old. He learned this work from his parents. His job is located at a 2 kilometer distance from his home. To get there, he has to walk. His work day starts at 5:00 a.m. and returns home at 12:00 noon to continue taking care of the household chores. No one else in his household works, only him.

Martín is requesting a loan to buy two calves. He plans to care for them for a year and then sell them so that he can pay back the loan and invest the earnings in improving his home.

Martín dreams of a better future for his partner and his future children.

loans.use: to buy two calves.

loans.name: Ketty Lady

texts.es:
Ketty Lady tiene 37 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive junto a su menor hija en casa de sus padres en el distrito de Santo Tomás, ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú. Su población se dedica principalmente al comercio y crianza de animales menores y ganado vacuno, así como a la agricultura (cultivos de café, yucas, frutales y hortalizas).

Ella se dedica a la crianza y comercio de cerdos. Adicionalmente realiza tejido de cubrecamas a crochet. Cuenta con más de 14 años de experiencia en este negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Ketty Lady ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de cerdos, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos, de esta manera espera ofrecer un producto de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que se verá reflejado en su nivel de ingresos y le permitirá incrementar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ketty Lady is 37 years old. She is a single mother. She lives with her young daughter in her parents' house in the district of Santo Tomás, located in the province of Cutervo, in the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru. The people there work principally in commerce and raising small animals and cattle, as well as in agriculture, raising crops of coffee, yucca, fruits and vegetables.

She raises and sells pigs. In addition, she crochets bed covers. She has more than 14 years of experience in this business and has regular customers who provide very good personal and work references for her. Ketty Lady has applied for a loan to purchase a larger quantity of pigs, as well as balanced feed to fatten them. In this way she hops to offer a product of better quality to her customers, which will be reflected in her income level and will allow her to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a larger quantity of pigs, as well as balanced feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Elsa Yamileth

texts.es: Yamileth tiene 29 años de edad quien realizó sus estudios hasta el sexto grado pues no tuvo la oportunidad de seguir estudiando debido a que sus padres son de escasos recursos económicos. Ella es soltera, no tiene hijos y se dedica a la agricultura la siembra y cultivo de café aproximadamente desde hace 10 años siendo este rubro su fuerte y el de la familia esforzándose diariamente junto a sus padres para dar a sus hermanos la oportunidad que ella no tuvo  de seguir estudiando por la falta de apoyo económico tomando la decisión de dedicarse al cultivo de café rubro que sabiendo atender y cuidar con los contactos y clientes requeridos la posibilidad de crecer es mucha y teniendo los recursos como la propiedad la cual no alquila ubicada a unos 20 o 30 metros aproximadamente de su casa de habitacion gracias a una herencia de sus abuelos las posibilidades están a su favor. Como meta y sueño mejorar su calidad de vida, su negocio, apoyar a sus hermanos en sus estudios para que sean profesionales y con mejores oportunidades de las que ella tuvo o tiene para superarse en la vida. Por lo que en esta ocasión ella solicita pueda ser apoyada por los diferentes inversionistas en la plataforma de KIVA para poder atender su plantación de café la cual es del tipo lempira y desea comprar los abonos que necesita y el pago de mano de obra para poder dar una asistencia adecuada y personalizada para que esta temporada sea mejor que la anterior y pueda generar lo necesario para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Yamileth is 29 years old. She went to school up until the sixth grade. She didn't have the opportunity to keep studying because her parents have scarce economic resources. She is single and has no children. She makes her living planting and cultivating coffee for approximately the last 10 years, this being the primary income for her and her family. She works hard every day with her parents to give her siblings the opportunity she didn't have of being able to continue studying. Due to lack of economic support she decided to earn a living growing coffee, a business in which, if one knows how to take care of and maintain one's necessary contacts and clients, provides great opportunities for growth. Because she has at her disposal a property which she does not rent, located about 20-30 meters from her home, thanks to an inheritance from her grandparents, the odds are in her favor. 

She dreams of improving her quality of life and her business, supporting her siblings in their studies so that they can become professionals with better opportunities in life than she had or has. Therefore, she requests to be supported by the various investors in the KIVA platform to be able to take care of her coffee crop, which is of the Lempira variety. She wants to buy the fertilizers she needs and pay the labor to be able to give personalized and adequate care so that this season is better than the last and can generate what she needs to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and to pay labor to attend to her coffee cultivation.

loans.name: Federico Enrique

texts.es: Federico es un hombre emprendedor de 59 años de edad,  residente en un barrio  ubicado en el municipio de Barranquilla, es viudo y padre de tres hijas de 30, 31 y 33 años de edad. Federico ha ofrecido sus servicios en su taller de reparación y mantenimiento de electrodomésticos desde el año 1973, su idea de negocio surgió por la iniciativa de su padre, quien consiguió que un amigo lo admitiera para hacer prácticas luego de haber realizado estudios, de esta manera Federico logró obtener la destreza y afianzar sus conocimientos, fue entonces que inició su propio negocio junto a un hermano. En la actualidad  ha logrado mantener una clientela fidelizada, sus principales clientes son empresas y personas que confían en la calidad de su servicio, quienes cancelan de contado, por esta razón su negocio presenta un buen flujo de caja, sin embargo se hace necesario tener un stock de repuestos e insumos, puesto que los servicio son cancelados por los clientes después de recibidos los electrodomésticos en perfecto estado, para ello Federico está aplicando a su primer crédikiva,  por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, capital que invertirá en la compra de repuestos y accesorios como parlantes, fusibles, material de soldadura, bobinas, tarjetas y circuitos.  Está inversión beneficiará los tiempos de entrega y la eficiencia del servicio. Federico tiene como meta a futuro ampliar la cobertura de su negocio, por ello él trabaja con mucho compromiso y dedicación.
texts.en:
Federico is an enterprising man who is 59 years old and lives in a neighborhood located in the Barranquilla municipality.  He is widowed and the father of three daughters who are 30, 31 and 33 years old.  Federico has offered his services in his repair and maintenance workshop for electrical appliances since 1973.  His idea for the business arose due to the initiative of his father, who arranged for him to practice after he did his schoolwork.  This is how Federico managed to acquire this skill and strengthen his knowledge.  It was then that he started his own business with his brother. 

Currently, he maintains a loyal customer base.  His main clients are businesses and people who trust in the quality of his service and who pay in cash.  This is why his business has a good cash flow.  However, there is a need to have a stock of spare parts and supplies because the clients cancel their services after receiving their electrical appliances in perfect condition.  This is why Federico is applying for his first Kiva loan through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  He will invest the capital in the purchase of spare parts and accessories such as speakers, fuses, soldering materials, electrical coils, cards, and circuits.  This investment will reduce his turnaround time and the efficiency of his service.  Federico’s future goal is to expand the coverage of his business.  This is why he dedicates himself to his work.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and accessories such as speakers, fuses, soldering materials, electrical coils, cards, and circuits

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase ointments, teas, stomach medicine, vitamins, etc., in order to acquire merchandise that his clients want

loans.name: Jose Atilio

texts.es:
José, es un cliente satisfecho que se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo por la facilidad de pago que le brinda la institución, invertirá en huevos y agua purificada al mayoreo, cubrirá las nuevas demandas de sus clientes y mantendrá su negocio con vida.
El capital anterior le dio recursos económicos para hacer la adquisición de mercadería que sus clientes solicitaban, sus ingresos han mejorado, con lo que ha tenido oportunidad de cancelar parte de sus deudas y tener mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José is a satisfied client who has decided to request a new loan due to how easily he received his payments from this institution.  He will invest in eggs and purified water in bulk in order to meet the new demands of his clients and to maintain a lively business.

The previous capital gave him the economic resources to acquire merchandise that his clients requested.  His income has improved, which has given him the opportunity to pay off part of his debt and to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in eggs and purified water in bulk in order to meet the new demands of his clients and to maintain a lively business

loans.name: Edelie

texts.en:
Her name is Edelie. She is 54 and a resident of GMA, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Cristitoto, an employee, and has three children who are working. She manages her household while operating her business. She works hard to augment her income to support and meet her family's daily personal and household needs.

Edelie operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a general store is basically a small convenience store that sells fresh, dry, and packaged commodities directly to consumers. Almost all products are essential household items and food. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a PHP 5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by buying supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Aside from this, she also has a direct selling business for additional income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum net income of PHP 600 a day. 

To help her continue operations of her general store business, she is requesting a PHP 20,000 loan, which she will use to buy grocery items such as sacks of rice, noodles, canned goods, soda and other grocery stuffs. She is positive that it will boost her income as she expands her business. Her earnings are the source to meet their daily expenses. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given to her.

Edelie hopes to maintain and grow her business so she they can have a more comfortable life and prepare for her old age. She prays for good health and a happy family. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, beverages and toiletries to sell.

loans.name: Inocencio

texts.es:
Inocencio, tiene como actividad económica el cultivo de granos básicos, como maíz, frijol y maicillo  además práctica la crianza de ganado, su familia está compuesta por su esposa y dos hijos con edades de 24 y 20 años de edad, tiene dos hijos más que no viven con él, los trabajos en el campo los realiza desde su juventud y sus hijos lo apoyan.
Utilizará el crédito para pagar mozos que le ayuden a recolectar la cosecha de postrera y procesar la comida para el ganado, tendrá alimento para su familia y su ganado se mantendrá bien cuidado, espera que al vender el resto de la cosecha sus ingresos sean estables y mayores.
Su visión es adquirir otras propiedades para ampliar el área de cultivo y así tener estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Inocencio’s profession is cultivating staple grains such as corn, beans, and sorghum.  He also raises livestock.  His family is made up of his wife and his two children who are 24 and 20 years old.  He also has two other children who do not live with him.  He has carried out the work in the field since he was young, and his children help him. 

He will use the loan to pay the workers that help him harvest the final crop and to process the food for the livestock.  He will have food for his family and his livestock will continue being well cared for.  He hopes that upon selling the rest of his harvest, his income will be better and more stable.
His vision is to acquire other properties in order to increase the area of his harvest and therefore have economic stability.

loans.use: para pagar mozos que le ayuden a recolectar la cosecha de postrera y procesar la comida para el ganado

loans.name: Kokou

texts.fr: Kokou vit avec sa famille(femme et 02 enfants de 04 et 02ans) à KPALIME. Il revend des détergents et sollicite un premier crédit pour acheter des marchandises. Elle souhaite augmenter sa clientèle et assurer l'épanouissement social de la famille.
texts.en: Kokou lives with his family (wife and two children, four and two years old) in Kpalimé. He sells detergents and is applying for his first loan to stock up on merchandise. [He] would like to increase his customer base and provide for the well-being of his family.

loans.use: to buy detergents.

loans.name: Jeu Salomon

texts.es:
